marklogic.body:
Chris again has said what had to be said: We love #RedEye in spite of it being treated as the Fox step-child. Where else would a devoted audience sit through seemingly endless commercials for the Hoodie-Footie, Shiatsu Pillow Massager, exercise gizmos/torture devices, and we can't forget catheters!
How many other shows can say they are being watched and live tweeted at 3 a.m. EST?! The question of "Sleep or Red Eye" doesn't even warrant an answer unless you are a pilot, nuclear scientist, school bus driver or any vocation where the public's safety is involved.
If Fox wanted to promote the IPad app they should have had Greg Gutfeld and company do a segment on it! While that could have a chance to backfire, if Fox truly believes it is a viable app, they would have put it through a true test. Heck, I have lib friends who have that app now so it can't be all bad if they are willing to step into Murdoch territory.
Thank you, Chris, for yet another awesome post. Hopefully Fox will hear our pleas and maybe we can eat at the adult table in the near future.
